name: 5 Gyres
text: @JRobinsonHamm 1: Single use plastic! Think straws, cutlery, and packaging. If you can avoid those, you're already doing better than the average. 2: If it has the word "plastic" it will most likely act like a plastic so avoid that. Better to use natural materials!

name: 5 Gyres
text: @JRobinsonHamm 2- This is a great question! I would have to say in general the material is harmful to the environment, but its reusability is what would make it "better".
